function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Former hunters, now working as wildlife keepers, may still pose a risk of disease transmission due to their previous hunting activities and close contact with wildlife.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Introduction of non-organic waste to indigenous communities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ecotourism bringing people from different parts of the world to indigenous communities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of waste management in the community","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and connection to nature leading to unsustainable lifestyle.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of local cultures and traditions in the pursuit of tourism experiences.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to engage tourists in conservation efforts and environmental awareness.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Focus on potential over credentials in hiring process could lead to increased risk of contagious diseases in the workplace if health status is not properly assessed.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emphasis on sustainable development and conservation in partnerships may lead to increased risk of exposure to zoonotic diseases or environmental hazards.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for human health and well-being in favor of economic recovery may lead to increased risk of public health crises, including contagious diseases.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on community thinking may not always be practical or efficient in solving problems.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inequality in modern society due to emphasis on individualism over community spirit.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relying on communal support for renovation work may pose health risks during contagious disease outbreaks.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development of program focused on traditional medicines with local shaman","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Waste management program generating revenues from plastic waste","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Diversification of revenue streams including f&b, spa treatments, and transports","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Bringing sanitary and bedding materials from the capital may introduce contagious diseases from outside the local area.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on revenue from hotel nights can be risky, especially in the context of a pandemic such as covid-19.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Joint activities with local communities may increase the risk of disease transmission due to close contact and shared resources.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of local infrastructure to support covid-19 response","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on traditional medicine for virus protection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited access to clean water and sanitation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious disease transmission in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on external resources for the service industry","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of diversification in activities leading to inflexibility","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to increased tourism in the region","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disconnecting from over-connected life may impact awareness of health and safety measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased contact with nature may expose visitors to environmental health risks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases within local communities and among international visitors due to close interaction and collaboration.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of social promiscuity leading to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of pollution contributing to the spread of diseases and harming public health.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of unsustainable income sources contributing to public health challenges among local populations.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased use of automation, machine learning, and artificial intelligence in customer service","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on global production plants and suppliers, leading to vulnerability during lockdowns and social distancing measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact on people-intensive service businesses due to covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 in society","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Innovation in business models to cope with the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on ai and ml for disease outbreak prediction","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate identification of potential drugs for clinical trials","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid capture of varied information from the environment","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Millions of data points pouring in from various sources","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ml and ai algorithms distilling data into relevant knowledge for better customer service","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Capturing contactless screening data from millions of patients","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Skyrocketing calls to service centers in airline, hospitality, banking industries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increasing reliance on chatbots for customer service","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased use of automation and ai in service businesses may reduce the need for human interaction, potentially limiting the spread of contagious diseases in the built environment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Drone delivery and robot-powered delivery vehicles may minimize the need for human delivery personnel, reducing the potential for disease transmission through human contact.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased use of ml and ai in service firms may optimize business operations, reducing the need for human involvement and potentially limiting disease transmission through human contact.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of economic revenue in a business model due to the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Minimized philanthropic contributions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
